title: Property Market Trends in Gurgaon (2025)
excerpt: An updated look at luxury demand, inventory, and price movements across Gurugram micro-markets.
author: Altina™ Editorial
content: Gurugram continues to drive NCR’s luxury market, with demand strongest in Golf Course Road and Dwarka Expressway corridors.
New launches by DLF and M3M have seen high absorption, while ready-to-move inventory remains tight, supporting price resilience.
For investors, independent floors and mid-rise luxury apartments present favorable risk-reward with rent yields improving YoY.
